text: "Undo It" is a 2010 song by country artist Carrie Underwood and is the third single from her third studio album Play On. It went to number 23 in the United States, number 85 in Australia and number 43 in Canada. It also went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 2 on the Canadian Country charts. ==Music video== The music video for "Undo It" was directed by Chris Hicky. It premiered on CMT on May 7, 2010. It made history on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for being at number one for consecutive 12 weeks. ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:Country pop songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Undo It
